body:
You have an extremely unpopular opinion for this site which you are very vocal about, on which most of us are located on the exact opposite corner of the political compass as you. I've experienced the same before, but unfortunately reddit taught us that people will never stop using the downvote as a disagree button.

If you don't want to be downvoted, try posting in places like +UnpopularOpinion, or find a guild for your belief system where you can talk to like-minded people.
body_html:
You have an extremely unpopular opinion for this site which you are very vocal about, on which most of us are located on the exact opposite corner of the political compass as you. I've experienced the same before, but unfortunately reddit taught us that people will never stop using the downvote as a disagree button.

If you don't want to be downvoted, try posting in places like +UnpopularOpinion, or find a guild for your belief system where you can talk to like-minded people.
